TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InternalDataCollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Provides the base functionality for creating collections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection> class and its members are not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as the class from which other collection classes derive standard functionality.
